name: JP The Lost Game
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/F4szA3Hk7axeZtq17 

One day, a teenager named Jessica Parker heard a sound from her father’s desktop in a room. Then, JP was teleported into the desktop after she came to check it out. Now, she was stuck in a game and needed to finish it in order to escape. Can she make it out safely? Can she escape? You must save JP from this lost game. Are you ready?
